Package error_metric
[test_transport]

Routines containing error metrics for assessing convergence or accuracy. More...


Functions/Subroutines

subroutine error_norm (norm_1, norm_2, norm_inf, which_cell, vals, reference, ncell, dx)
 Calculate the L-1, L-2 and L-inf error norms for calculated values and reference solution.

Detailed Description

Routines containing error metrics for assessing convergence or accuracy.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine error_metric.error_norm ( real(stm_real),intent(out)  norm_1,
real(stm_real),intent(out)  norm_2,
real(stm_real),intent(out)  norm_inf,
integer,intent(out)  which_cell,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  vals,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  reference,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real),optional  dx 
)

Calculate the L-1, L-2 and L-inf error norms for calculated values and reference solution.

Parameters:
norm_1 L-1 error norm
norm_2 L-2 error norm
norm_inf L-inf error norm
which_cell The cell in which largest error occurs
vals Calculated values
reference Reference or 'other' values
ncell Number of cells
dx Spatial step !todo: do we use this????
